name: mega-drain
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
An attack that absorbs
half the damage inflicted.

half the damage inflicted.

drains half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.
